subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Russ Smith scored 23 points, and Louisville, playing just hours after it moved to No. 1, used a strong second half to beat host Connecticut, 73-60, on Monday night.
snippet: Russ Smith scored 23 points, and Louisville, playing just hours after it moved to No. 1, used a strong second half to beat host Connecticut, 73-60, on Monday night.
